channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Booking Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Booking Calendar

item.title: CVE-2021-24232|2024-08-03T19:21:19.041Z -- unknown -- advanced%20booking%20calendar
item.description: The Advanced Booking Calendar WordPress plugin before 1.6.8 does not sanitise the license error message when output in the settings page, leading to an authenticated reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue

item.title: CVE-2021-24225|2024-08-03T19:21:18.700Z -- unknown -- advanced%20booking%20calendar
item.description: The Advanced Booking Calendar WordPress plugin before 1.6.7 did not sanitise the calId GET parameter in the "Seasons & Calendars" page before outputing it in an A tag, leading to a reflected XSS issue
